issues.description: The Farm class in the solution defines its `animals` field as `Queue<Animal>` backed by a `LinkedList`, whereas the problem statement and UML explicitly require `List<Animal>` initialized with an `ArrayList`.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the `animals` field in `Farm` to be of type `List<Animal>` and initialize it in the no-arg constructor with `new ArrayList<>()` to match the UML and problem description.
